column4: Would anyone have any idea why this entry in crontab doesn't work: (*/15 * * * * /usr/bin/xfdesktop -reload) while this entry does: (*/15 * * * * echo "It works" > ~/readme)?
odd, try oputting it in quotes
I'd tried that, but it doesn't seem to be working, Juhaz: does that means it's impossible to do with cron, do that I need to set that variable?
yeah, sorry.. just realised that you were running a graphical app :P
